---
title: "Dashboard Retur per Hari"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: rows
    vertical_layout: fill
    theme: cosmo
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(plotly)

# Load dan siapkan data
df <- read_excel("G:/My Drive/REPORT/RETUR IN.xlsx", sheet = "ALL RCV")

df <- df %>%
  mutate(`Receipt date` = as.Date(`Receipt date`)) %>%
  group_by(`Receipt date`) %>%
  summarise(Total = sum(`Total qty`, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  rename(Tanggal = `Receipt date`)

# Grafik tampil di sini

```{r}
ggplotly(
  ggplot(df, aes(x = Tanggal, y = Total)) +
    geom_line(color = "steelblue", size = 1.2) +
    geom_point(color = "darkblue") +
    labs(title = "Total Retur per Hari", x = "Tanggal", y = "Total Retur") +
    theme_minimal()
)
